tool.name: SanderMdrun
tool.description: : Wrapper of the AmberTools (AMBER MD Package) sander tool module.

param.name: input_top_path
param.label: input TOP,PARMTOP,PRMTOP file
param.help: Input topology file (AMBER ParmTop). Format: [input].[format]

param.name: input_crd_path
param.label: input CRD,MDCRD,INPCRD,NETCDF,NC,NCRST file
param.help: Input coordinates file (AMBER crd). Format: [input].[format]

param.name: input_mdin_path
param.label: input MDIN,IN,TXT file
param.help: Input configuration file (MD run options) (AMBER mdin). Format: [input].[format]

param.name: input_cpin_path
param.label: input CPIN file
param.help: Input constant pH file (AMBER cpin). Format: [input].cpin

param.name: input_ref_path
param.label: input RST,RST7,NETCDF,NC,NCRST,CRD file
param.help: Input reference coordinates for position restraints. Format: [input].[format]

param.name: outname_output_log_path
param.label: output LOG,OUT,TXT,O name
param.help: Output log file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_traj_path
param.label: output TRJ,CRD,MDCRD,X,NETCDF,NC name
param.help: Output trajectory file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_rst_path
param.label: output RST,RST7,NETCDF,NC,NCRST name
param.help: Output restart file Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_cpout_path
param.label: output CPOUT name
param.help: Output constant pH file (AMBER cpout) Format: [output].cpout

param.name: outname_output_cprst_path
param.label: output CPRST,RST,RST7 name
param.help: Output constant pH restart file (AMBER rstout) Format: [output].[format]

param.name: outname_output_mdinfo_path
param.label: output MDINFO name
param.help: Output MD info Format: [output].mdinfo

param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: mdin
param.label: mdin
param.help: Sander MD run options specification. (Used if *input_mdin_path* is None) (Json)

param.label: simulation_type
param.help: Default options for the mdin file. Each creates a different mdin file.

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: sander binary path to be used.

param.name: direct_mdin
param.label: direct_mdin
param.help: Use input_mdin_path as it is, skip file parsing.
